name: davinci-resolve-mcp
description: MCP server integration for DaVinci Resolve
readme_summary: The DaVinci Resolve MCP Server acts as a bridge between AI coding assistants (like Cursor and Claude) and DaVinci Resolve. It allows these assistants to query and control DaVinci Resolve using natural language, enabling AI-powered automation and scripting within the video editing software.
key_features: Connects AI coding assistants to DaVinci Resolve
Enables querying and controlling DaVinci Resolve through natural language
Provides a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server
Includes configuration templates for different AI assistants
primary_use_case: Enabling AI-powered control and automation of DaVinci Resolve through natural language interfaces provided by AI coding assistants.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled puppeteer controlling a miniature DaVinci Resolve interface with strings connected to a large language model brain. The puppeteer uses natural language commands written on scrolls to manipulate the DaVinci Resolve controls. The scene is set in a futuristic control room with glowing screens displaying video editing workflows. Small UI elements showing code snippets and MCP commands are subtly integrated into the scene. The composition is focused and clean with a blue and green color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: docker-firefox
readme_summary: This repository provides a Docker container for running Firefox. It allows users to access the Firefox GUI through a web browser or VNC client without requiring local installation or configuration. The container encapsulates Firefox and its dependencies, simplifying deployment and management.
key_features: GUI access via web browser or VNC
Security features (SSVNC, Certificates, VNC Password, Web Authentication)
Setting Firefox preferences via environment variables
primary_use_case: Running Firefox in a containerized environment for simplified deployment and remote access.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a lighthouse keeper using a powerful, antique-style web browser (Firefox) as a lens to scan the digital sea for ships (data). The lighthouse beam projects a clean, secure browsing experience onto the ships, guiding them safely. The keeper is meticulously adjusting settings on a control panel with environment variable labels. Small screens display snippets of code and network activity. The scene is set inside the lighthouse with warm, inviting lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a vintage-meets-modern aesthetic, incorporating the Firefox logo subtly.

name: bg-remove
description: Free image background removal - private, client-side and powered by Transformers.js
readme_summary: The `bg-remove` repository provides a React + Vite application for removing backgrounds from images directly in the browser. It leverages Transformers.js and machine learning models like RMBG-1.4 and MODNet to process images locally, ensuring privacy and eliminating the need for server-side processing. The application offers features like custom background selection, transparent background downloads, and optional WebGPU acceleration.
key_features: Custom background color and image selection
Download options for both transparent and colored backgrounds
Local processing - no server uploads needed
Privacy-focused - all processing happens in your browser
primary_use_case: Removing backgrounds from images in the browser without server-side processing, prioritizing privacy and offering customization options.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled sculptor meticulously chiseling away the background from a marble statue, revealing the figure in sharp detail. The sculptor uses digital tools, with a subtle UI screen displaying the `bg-remove` interface. Digital particles float around the statue, representing the transformation process. The sculptor's studio is filled with various statues, some with backgrounds, some without. The scene is set in a brightly lit, modern workshop. The composition is clean and focused, highlighting the sculptor and the statue. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.

name: rever
description: Rever AI - powered finance automation that elevates control, unifies systems, and enables foresight for modern CFOs.
readme_summary: Rever is an AI-powered finance automation platform designed for modern CFOs. It aims to unify financial systems, elevate control, and enable foresight by providing features like vendor management, purchase order management, bill management with two-way matching, approval workflows, and audit history.
primary_use_case: Finance automation for businesses, focusing on streamlining processes like vendor management, purchase orders, and bill management to improve accuracy and compliance.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect overseeing the construction of a grand financial building. The architect uses a blueprint labeled 'Rever' and directs robotic arms that assemble modules representing vendors, invoices, and payments. Glowing data streams flow between the modules, creating a unified structure. Small UI screens display real-time financial metrics and approval workflows. The scene is set in a futuristic construction site with bright, optimistic lighting. The composition is wide and balanced with a focus on the architect. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors.

name: kubevela
readme_summary: KubeVela is a modern application delivery platform designed to simplify the deployment and operation of applications across hybrid and multi-cloud environments. It emphasizes deployment as code, built-in observability, and multi-cloud support, while maintaining a lightweight and extensible architecture.
key_features: Deployment as Code using workflows and CUE
Built-in observability, multi-tenancy, and security support
primary_use_case: Simplifying application deployment and management across hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect overseeing the construction of a futuristic city, where each building represents an application being deployed. The architect uses a control panel with glowing CUE code snippets to orchestrate the placement of buildings across different cloud islands floating in the sky. Beams of light connect the control panel to the buildings, indicating the deployment workflow. Small UI elements display real-time deployment status and resource allocation. The scene is set in a bright, optimistic atmosphere with a clean, isometric perspective. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.
